question:
Consider the following climates:
  1. British Type climate 
  2. Mediterranean type climate
  3. China type climate
  Which of the above is/are examples of Mesothermal Climate?
explanation:
As per Koppen climate classification, subtypes of Temperate/Mesothermal climate are:
  • Dry-summer or Mediterranean climates 
  • Temperate or subtropical hot summer climates
  • Maritime temperate climates or Oceanic climates 
  • Maritime subarctic climates or sub polar oceanic climate
  • Temperate highland climates with dry winters
